ch0192_00_matsubusa/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... Your arrival on
Pasio is no coincidence. I believe it was destiny.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0101_0701_02_10:
I can see in your eyes that you have an
indomitable will. I hope you can grow from all
that you’ll see and experience.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0601_0701_01_10:
This foolish world has held back humanity’s
progress out of misguided idealism regarding
the coexistence of humans and Pokémon.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0601_0701_02_10:
I will bring that to its rightful end and create
a new land upon which humanity may stride
freely forward.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0601_0701_03_10:
By expanding the land, I’ll create an ideal world
for humanity’s continual growth and evolution!
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0602_0701_01_10:
Did you know that meteorites contain
latent power?
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0602_0701_02_10:
Under the right conditions, it’s possible to alter the
qualities of a meteorite.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0602_0701_03_10:
Yes, even into a Mega Stone. Or even into a
Key Stone.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0602_0701_04_10:
I believe this power has the potential to help us
achieve our goals.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0603_0701_01_10:
Team Magma is an organization dedicated to
the further advancement and evolution
of humanity.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0603_0701_02_10:
Every morning at eleven o’clock, I gather my team
members and give them a speech on a useful
subject. You could call it a lecture of sorts.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0603_0701_03_10:
By listening to me, they acquire knowledge and
wisdom... In other words, they evolve as people.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0603_0701_04_10:
Unlike Team Aqua, we adhere to rules
and structure.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0604_0701_01_10:
We in Team Magma have invented a suit that
incorporates a variety of scientific technology.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0604_0701_02_10:
We call it the Magma Suit! It allows the wearer
to move through magma unharmed.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0604_0701_03_10:
The power of nature is formidable, but with the
power of technology, we are more than capable
of competing with it!
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... Do you have
a friend who you consider to be your rival?
ch0192_00_matsubusa/0605_0701_02_10:
I have someone like that. In the past, we worked
together on the same team.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/1701_0701_02_10: There’s no reason for you to decline. Just take it.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/1701_0702_01_10: I expect you’ll make good use of it.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m fascinated by the technology that was used to
build this artificial island of Pasio.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve been trying to recruit Pasio’s creator to join
Team Magma...but we haven’t had much luck
so far.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0701_03_10:
Well, I suppose it doesn’t matter that much. I can
handle my team’s research and development on
my own.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0701_04_10:
I’ll figure out the inner workings of
Pasio’s technology.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0702_01_10:
Pasio’s creator didn’t respond to my
recruitment offer...
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0702_02_10:
Nevertheless, I think I’ll still be able to gather
some promising human resources while I’m here.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2501_0702_03_10:
By that, I mean you, of course. Won’t you
join Team Magma and contribute to our
glorious cause?
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0701_01_10:
If I can somehow acquire Pasio’s technology, I can
make significant advancements toward realizing
my ideal world.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0701_02_10:
I can expand the stage for humanity to take great
strides forward and evolve!
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0701_03_10:
And with this, we can help humanity—or rather,
all forms of life—achieve infinite happiness!
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0701_04_10:
My apologies. I got carried away yet again...
I have a bad habit of forgetting about everything
else when I get passionate about something.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0702_01_10:
I will take control of any power that will help me
achieve my ideals!
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0702_02_10:
I make no exceptions, not even for Groudon...or
you, for that matter.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/2511_0702_03_10:
You have a certain charisma that draws people to
you. One day, I shall make that power mine!
ch0192_00_matsubusa/3001_0701_01_10:
One day, my ideal world will become a reality.
It will rise up like the morning sun.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/3003_0701_01_10:
I would love to learn more about how they built
Pasio. It could prove useful to my goals.
ch0192_00_matsubusa/3005_0701_01_10:
The beauty of city lights glimmering in the night
is a triumph of human innovation and ingenuity.
